title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. LVIII, pt. 5009 - Vesting (deferred Retirement)
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. LVIII, pt. 5009 - Vesting (deferred Retirement)

State Regulations
§ 5009.1 - Automatic vesting for members with a date of membership prior to July 27, 1976
§ 5009.2 - Rights of a member with a date of membership prior to July 27, 1976 who has vested
§ 5009.3 - Rights of a member with a date of membership on or after July 27, 1976, but before September 1, 1983, who has vested
§ 5009.4 - Rights of a member with a date of membership on or after September 1, 1983 but before January 1, 2010, who has vested
§ 5009.5 - Rights of a member with a date of membership on or after January 1, 2010, who has vested
§ 5009.6 - Forfeitures

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. LVIII, pt. 5009

Statutory authority: Education Law, §§509, 512-a;Retirement
and Social Security Law, §§516, 612

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
